channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How one AI startup is helping rice farmers battle climate change
item.description: Mitti Labs is working with The Nature Conservancy to expand the use of climate friendly rice farming practices in India. The startup uses its AI to ve...

item.title: The Framework Laptop 16 Can Now Be Upgraded to an RTX 5070
item.description: The Nvidia RTX 5070 is coming to the Framework Laptop 16, proving that upgradable GPUs in laptops aren’t just a fool’s errand.

item.title: How They Make the Mario Kart-Style 'Ghost Car' for Auto Racing Broadcasts
item.description: Watch a Formula 1, Nascar, or IndyCar race and you'll see a “ghost car” overlayed atop the real-life image. The sensors used to create it also collect...

item.title: Security researcher maps hundreds of TeslaMate servers spilling Tesla vehicle data
item.description: A security researcher mapped TeslaMate servers that are publicly exposed to the internet, including sensitive Tesla vehicle data, such as their locati...

item.title: Matter Is Finally Ready to Deliver the Smart Home It Promised
item.description: After a turbulent beginning, smart home standard Matter feels like it’s growing up. And with big-name supporters like Google, Apple—and Ikea—behind it...

item.title: Lenovo IdeaPad 5i 2-in-1 Review: Barely Squeaking By
item.description: Lenovo’s IdeaPad 5i 2-in-1 is a standard budget laptop with just enough qualities to be worth the money when it’s on sale.

item.title: iPhone 17, the ‘thinnest iPhone ever,’ and everything else we’re expecting out of Apple’s hardware event
item.description: From a new slim iPhone Air model to redesigned AirPods, here's what to expect from this year's Apple event.

item.title: YouTube’s ‘Hype’ feature that boosts smaller creators launches globally
item.description: Viewers have the opportunity to hype up to three videos per week for a favorite creator. This gives the video points, which helps it gain traction on ...

item.title: Parents sue OpenAI over ChatGPT’s role in son’s suicide
item.description: Before sixteen-year-old Adam Raine died by suicide, he had spent months telling ChatGPT about his plans to end his life.

item.title: 14 Best Soundbars We’ve Tested and Reviewed (2025): Sonos, Sony, Bose
item.description: Every television deserves a row of speakers to call its own. These are our favorite soundbars.
